title: Buy or Sell + TNF Preview, Business Decisions - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/6
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode headed into Week 5! On today’s fantasy football podcast, a number of tough fantasy lineup questions and answers! What to do with Allen Robinson and Robert Woods? Plus, the Week 5 edition of Buy or Sell, and a preview of an exciting Thursday Night Football matchup between the Rams vs Seahawks. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 6th, 2021.
  
 (5:30) - Buy or Sell
 (12:50) - NFL News
 (23:00) - Mailbag
 (23:30) - Allen Robinson or Laviska Shenault?
 (29:05) - Trade CeeDee Lamb?
 (32:25) - 49ers backfield
 (38:00) - David Montgomery
 (39:05) - Trade Deebo Samuel for Calvin Ridley?
 (43:00) - Najee Harris or Nick Chubb rest of season?
 (46:05) - Lack of trades
 (47:50) - Thursday Night Breakdown - Rams at Seahawks
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
